headline: Builders FirstSource Announces Two Acquisitions in Turnkey Millwork Solutions
summary: IRVING, Texas, October 01, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) ("Builders FirstSource" or the "Company") announced two acquisitions in the Las Vegas area – Builder’s Door & Trim and Rystin Construction.
